required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Surgical Outcomes of Cataract Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the visual outcome of the cataract surgery, including best uncorrected and corrected visual acuity, spherical equivalent, wavefront aberration and other measurements.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in visual acuity at one month after cataract surgery
primary_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until one month after surgery

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in spherical equivalent at one month after cataract surgery
primary_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until one month after surgery

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in visual acuity at six months after cataract surgery
primary_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until six months after surgery

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in spherical equivalent at six months after cataract surgery
primary_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until six months after cataract surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in wavefront aberration at one month after cataract surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until one month after surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in contrast sensitivity at one month after cataract surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until one month after surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in intraocular light scattering at one month after cataract surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until one month after surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in wavefront aberration at six months after cataract surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until six months after surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in contrast sensitivity at six months after cataract surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until six months after surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in intraocular light scattering at six months after cataract surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until six months after surgery

other_outcome.measure: The difference between attempted and achieved refractive correction at one month after cataract surgery
other_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until one month after surgery

other_outcome.measure: The difference between attempted and achieved refractive correction at six months after cataract surgery
other_outcome.time_frame: Follow-up until six months after surgery

study_pop.textblock: Medical centre: Eye and ENT Hospital of Fudan University

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Clinical diagnosis of cataract
- Must be able to cooperate with the ophthalmic examination
Exclusion Criteria:
- Clinical diagnosis of mental illness
- Mentally disabled

overall_official.affiliation: Eye and ENT Hospital of Fudan University
